GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

POST /api/reviews.description: creates a new review, accepts review object with the properties owner, title, review_body, designer and category, responds with the newly added review object

request body.title: Splendor
request body.review_body: The only real way to meet the great Sheik Ullah

example response.title: Splendor
example response.review_body: The only real way to meet the great Sheik Ullah

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: updates the review with keys from the request body, currently only accepts inc_votes, responds with the updated review

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments on review

comments.body: My dog loved this game too!
comments.author: mallionaire

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: creates an new comment on the review, accepts comment object with valid username and body, responds with the created comment object

request body.body: This game was mad to the max

example response.body: This game was mad to the max

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.example response: Status 204 - No body is returned by this endpoint

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the comment with keys from the request body, currently only accepts inc_votes, responds with the updated comment

example response.body: My dog loved this game too!
example response.author: mallionaire

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
